name: US Cities Quiz / Test | USA - Cities | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which direction would you go if you took the shortest route from Detroit, Michigan to Canada?
questions.explanation:
South.

	It's the only spot in Canada where you would go directly north to the US, so if you were to go the other way you would be going south. Take a look at a map of North America if you do not believe this.

questions.text: In what New York city was President Mckinley assasinated?
What city hosts the Kentucky Derby?
What Tennessee City is home to the Jack Daniels distillery?
questions.explanation:
Lynchburg.

	The amazing fact about this is that Lynchburg is dry and you can make Jack Daniels there but you can not buy it.

questions.text: What Texas city is across the border from Juarez Mexico?
If the tag on your luggage had 'ORD' on it, Which city would you be flying into?
What is the proper spelling for the capital of New Mexico?
In Sweetwater, Texas, every year they have a roundup for what?
Where did Motown move to in 1972?
questions.explanation:
Los Angeles.

	Motown Records moved from Detroit to Los Angeles in 1972.

questions.text: What California city once had Clint Eastwood as its mayor?
